TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit DirectoryEntry extends System.ComponentModel.Component

summary.span: 类可封装 Active Directory 域服务层次结构中的节点或对象。

span.span: The class encapsulates a node or object in the Active Directory Domain Services hierarchy.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用此类用于绑定到对象，或读取和更新属性。Use this class for binding to objects, or reading and updating attributes. 以及帮助器类，提供对支持生命周期管理和导航的方法。, along with helper classes, provides support for life-cycle management and navigation methods. 其中包括创建、 删除、 重命名、 移动子节点时，和枚举子级。These include creating, deleting, renaming, moving a child node, and enumerating children. 修改节点后，你必须提交顺序将它们保存到树所做的更改。After you modify a node, you must commit your changes in order for them to be saved to the tree. 有关更多信息，请参见 属性。For more information, see the property. 可用来从架构条目访问正则项和某些，但不是所有信息。 can be used to access regular entries and some, but not all, information from schema entries. Active Directory 域服务层次结构包含多达几个几千个节点。The Active Directory Domain Services hierarchy contains up to several thousand nodes. 每个节点表示的对象，例如网络打印机或域中的用户。Each node represents an object, such as a network printer or a user in a domain. 企业网络则不断更改录用新员工以及添加网络打印机和计算机等对象。Corporate networks constantly change as new employees are hired and objects such as network printers and computers are added. Active Directory 服务接口 (ADSI) 技术提供了如何以编程方式将这些对象添加到目录树。Active Directory Service Interfaces (ADSI) technology provides ways to programmatically add these objects to the directory tree. 若要在层次结构中创建目录项，使用属性。To create a directory entry in the hierarchy, use the property. 属性是一个集合，提供方法，通过它你可以将节点添加到紧接在当前绑定到的父节点的集合。The property is a collection that provides an method, through which you add a node to the collection directly below the parent node that you are currently bound to. 当将节点添加到集合中，你必须指定新节点的名称以及你想要与节点关联的架构模板的名称。When adding a node to the collection, you must specify a name for the new node and the name of a schema template that you want to associate with the node. 例如，你可能想要使用标题为"计算机"的架构将新计算机添加到层次结构。For example, you might want to use a schema titled "Computer" to add new computers to the hierarchy. 此类还包含特性缓存，这可用于优化网络流量。This class also contains attribute caching, which can be useful for optimizing network traffic. 若要使用特性缓存，请参阅属性。To use attribute caching, see the property. 与相关联的类组件可与任何 Active Directory 域服务服务提供程序。The classes associated with the component can be used with any of the Active Directory Domain Services service providers. 某些当前提供程序是 Internet 信息服务 (IIS)、 轻型目录访问协议 (LDAP)、 Novell NetWare 目录服务 (NDS) 和 WinNT。Some of the current providers are Internet Information Services (IIS), Lightweight Directory Access Protocol (LDAP), Novell NetWare Directory Service (NDS), and WinNT. > [!NOTE] > 假设你已在使用此类之前大致了解 Active Directory 域服务。It is assumed that you have a general understanding of Active Directory Domain Services before using this class. 有关详细信息，请参阅命名空间概述。For more information, see the namespace overview.

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例，该类可绑定到指定的本机 Active Directory 域服务对象。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class that binds to the specified native Active Directory Domain Services object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此构造函数使程序能够使用的方法和属性类上实现 Iad 接口通过本机 API 的本机 Active Directory 域服务对象。This constructor enables a program to use the methods and properties of the class on a native Active Directory Domain Services object that implements the IADs interface through a native API. 有关 Iad 接口的详细信息，请参阅主题[Iad](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/default.asp?url=/library/adsi/adsi/iads.asp)在 MSDN 库中[ http://msdn.microsoft.com/library ](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library)。For more information about the IADs interface, see the topic [IADs](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/default.asp?url=/library/adsi/adsi/iads.asp) in the MSDN Library at [http://msdn.microsoft.com/library](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library).

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Children As DirectoryEntries

summary.span: 获取 Active Directory 域服务层次结构中此节点的子项。

span.span: Gets the child entries of this node in the Active Directory Domain Services hierarchy.

value.span: 一个 对象，其中包含 Active Directory 域服务层次结构中此节点的子项。

span.span: A object containing the child entries of this node in the Active Directory Domain Services hierarchy.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 子 entries 是仅将此节点的直接子级。The child entries are only the immediate children of this node. 使用此属性来查找，检索，或者层次结构中创建目录项。Use this property to find, retrieve, or create a directory entry in the hierarchy. 此属性是一个集合，以及常用迭代功能，提供通过它你可以将节点添加到紧接在当前绑定到的父节点集合的方法。This property is a collection that, along with the usual iteration capabilities, provides an method through which you add a node to the collection directly below the parent node that you are currently bound to. 当将节点添加到集合中，你必须指定新节点的名称以及你想要与节点关联的架构模板的名称。When adding a node to the collection, you must specify a name for the new node and the name of a schema template that you want to associate with the node. 例如，你可能想要使用标题为"计算机"的架构将新计算机添加到层次结构。For example, you might want to use a schema titled "Computer" to add new computers to the hierarchy. > [!NOTE] > 默认情况下，更改本地缓存。By default, changes are made locally to a cache. 修改或添加节点后，必须调用方法以提交更改，以便它们保存到树中的。After you modify or add a node, you must call the method to commit your changes in order for them to be saved to the tree. 如果调用之前调用，到属性缓存任何未提交的更改将会丢失。If you call before calling , any uncommitted changes to the property cache will be lost. 有关详细信息，请参阅和方法，与属性。For more information, see the and methods, and the property.

span.span: To retrieve the child entries.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void Close() cil managed

summary.span: 关闭 对象并释放与此组件关联的任何系统资源。

span.span: Closes the object and releases any system resources that are associated with this component.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 调用此方法以释放非托管的系统资源，而不用等待垃圾回收。Call this method to release unmanaged system resources, without waiting for garbage collection. 在调用，任何操作都可能引发异常。Following a call to , any operations on the might raise exceptions.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void CommitChanges() cil managed

summary.span: 将目录项所作更改保存到基础目录存储中。

span.span: Saves changes that are made to a directory entry to the underlying directory store.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 默认情况下，对属性的更改进行本地到缓存中，并要读取的属性值将被缓存后第一次读取。By default, changes to properties are made locally to a cache, and property values to be read are cached after the first read. 有关详情，请参阅。For more information, see . 对缓存所做更改将对属性的更改以及对的调用包括（如果这是新创建的项）。Changes made to the cache include changes to the properties as well as calls to (if this is the newly created entry). > [!CAUTION] > 如果调用之前调用，到属性缓存任何未提交的更改将会丢失。If you call before calling , any uncommitted changes to the property cache will be lost. ## 安全性Security - 使用读取、 写入、 删除、 更改和添加到 Active Directory 域服务层次结构的类。Use the class for reading, writing, deleting, changing, and adding to the Active Directory Domain Services hierarchy. 关联枚举：。Associated enumeration: .

span.span: To commit the changes.

summary.span: 创建此项的副本。

span.span: Creates a copy of this entry.

span.span: A object that represents the copy of this entry as a child of the new parent.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果是`true`，调用上要使副本永久的新对象。If is `true`, call on the new object to make the copy permanent. 轻型目录访问协议 (LDAP) 提供程序当前不支持方法。The Lightweight Directory Access Protocol (LDAP) provider does not currently support the method.

span.span: The specified is not a container.
To make a copy of the specified object.

summary.span: 用指定的新名称创建 对象的副本，并将其作为指定父级 对象的子项。

span.span: Creates a copy of this object, as a child of the specified parent object, with the specified new name.

span.span: A renamed copy of this entry as a child of the specified parent.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 轻型目录访问协议 (LDAP) 提供程序当前不支持此方法。The Lightweight Directory Access Protocol (LDAP) provider does not currently support this method. 如果是`true`，调用上要使副本永久的新对象。If is `true`, call on the new object to make the copy permanent.

exception.span: 指定的 对象不是容器。

span.span: The specified object is not a container.
To make a copy of the entry.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void DeleteTree() cil managed

summary.span: 从 Active Directory 域服务层次结构中删除此项及其整个子树。

span.span: Deletes this entry and its entire subtree from the Active Directory Domain Services hierarchy.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Active Directory 服务接口 (ADSI) 系统提供提供程序仅轻型目录访问协议 (LDAP) 当前支持此操作。Of the Active Directory Service Interfaces (ADSI) system-supplied providers, only the Lightweight Directory Access Protocol (LDAP) currently supports this operation. > [!CAUTION] > 从 Active Directory 域服务层次结构会删除该条目和及其整个子树。The entry and its entire subtree are deleted from the Active Directory Domain Services hierarchy. ## 安全性Security - 使用为从 Active Directory 域服务层次结构中删除项。Use for deleting entries from the Active Directory Domain Services hierarchy. 关联枚举：。Associated enumeration: .

span.span: The specified is not a container.
To delete the entry and its children.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig virtual instance void Dispose(bool disposing) cil managed
Protected Overrides Sub Dispose (disposing As Boolean)

param.name: disposing
param.span: 若要释放托管资源和非托管资源，则为 ；若仅释放非托管资源，则为 。

span.span: to release both managed and unmanaged resources; to release only unmanaged resources.

summary.span: 释放 使用的资源（内存除外）。

span.span: Disposes of the resources (other than memory) that are used by the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法称为由公共方法和方法。This method is called by the public method and the method. 调用受保护方法替换`disposing`参数设置为`true`。 invokes the protected method with the `disposing` parameter set to `true`. 调用与`disposing`设置为`false`。 invokes with `disposing` set to `false`. 当`disposing`参数是`true`，此方法释放由任何托管对象持有的所有资源此对象引用。When the `disposing` parameter is `true`, this method releases all resources that are held by any managed objects that this object references. 此方法调用每个引用对象的 方法。This method invokes the method of each referenced object. 有关详细信息和方法，请参阅[重写 Finalize 方法](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8026cb68-fe93-43fc-96c1-c09ad7d64cd3)。For more information about the and methods, see [Overriding the Finalize Method](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8026cb68-fe93-43fc-96c1-c09ad7d64cd3).

para.span: 可以由其他对象多次调用。

span.span: can be called multiple times by other objects.

para.span: 重写 时，请注意不要引用在以前调用 时已释放的对象。

span.span: When overriding , be careful not to reference objects that have been previously disposed of in an earlier call to .

para.span: 有关如何实现详细信息，请参阅[实现 Dispose 方法](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md)。

span.span: For more information about how to implement , see [Implementing a Dispose Method](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md).

span.span: Gets the native Active Directory Service Interfaces (ADSI) object.
The native ADSI object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用此属性时要使用 COM 接口实现 Iad 接口中，将本机 Active Directory 域服务对象强制转换。Use this property to cast the native Active Directory Domain Services object, which implements the IADs interface, when you want to use a COM interface. 有关 Iad 接口的详细信息，请参阅主题[Iad](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/default.asp?url=/library/adsi/adsi/iads.asp)在 MSDN 库中[ http://msdn.microsoft.com/library ](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/default.asp?url=/library/adsi/adsi/iads.asp)。For more information about the IADs interface, see the topic [IADs](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/default.asp?url=/library/adsi/adsi/iads.asp) in the MSDN Library at [http://msdn.microsoft.com/library](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/default.asp?url=/library/adsi/adsi/iads.asp). 此对象是用于无法进行完成的高级方案单独的类。This object is for advanced scenarios that cannot be accomplished with the classes alone. 若要使用它，你需要从 Iad 系列中，导入 COM 接口之一，然后强制转换到该接口的此属性。To use it, you need to import one of the COM interfaces from the IADs family, then cast this property to that interface.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::DirectoryServices::ActiveDirectorySecurity ^ ObjectSecurity { System::DirectoryServices::ActiveDirectorySecurity ^ get(); void set(System::DirectoryServices::ActiveDirectorySecurity ^ value); };

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ Path { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置此 的路径。

span.span: Gets or sets the path for this .
The path of this object.
The default is an empty string ("").

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性唯一地标识在网络环境中的此项。The property uniquely identifies this entry in a networked environment. 始终可以使用此检索此项。This entry can always be retrieved using this . 设置检索新条目从目录中存储; 它不会更改在当前绑定项的路径。Setting the retrieves a new entry from the directory store; it does not change the path of the currently bound entry. 与相关联的类组件可与任何 Active Directory 域服务服务提供程序。The classes associated with the component can be used with any of the Active Directory Domain Services service providers. 某些当前提供程序是 Internet 信息服务 (IIS)、 轻型目录访问协议 (LDAP)、 Novell NetWare 目录服务 (NDS) 和 WinNT。Some of the current providers are Internet Information Services (IIS), Lightweight Directory Access Protocol (LDAP), Novell NetWare Directory Service (NDS), and WinNT. > [!NOTE] > 部分标识提供程序 （"://"之前） 区分大小写。The section of the that identifies the provider (precedes "://") is case-sensitive. 例如，"LDAP: / /"或"WinNT: / /"。For example, "LDAP://" or "WinNT://". 语法属性会根据提供程序而不同。The syntax for the property varies according to the provider. 一些常见的情况有：Some common scenarios are: WinNTWinNT - 连接到计算机上的组。Connect to a group on a computer. 例如，"WinNT**://\<域名 > /\<计算机名称 > /\<组名称 >**"。For example, "WinNT**://\/\/\**". 如果要连接到本地计算机，"WinNT: / /**\<计算机名称 > /\<组名称 >**"。If you are connecting to a local computer, "WinNT://**\/\**". - 连接到计算机上的用户。Connect to a user on a computer. 例如，"WinNT: / /**\<域名 > /\<计算机名称 > /\<用户名 >**"。For example, "WinNT://**\/\/\**". 如果要连接到本地计算机，"WinNT: / /**\<计算机名称 > /\<用户名 >**"。If you are connecting to a local computer, "WinNT://**\/\**". - 连接到计算机上的服务。Connect to services on a computer. 例如，"WinNT: / /**\<域名 > /\<计算机名称 > /\<服务名称 >**"。For example, "WinNT://**\/\/\**". 如果要连接到本地计算机，"WinNT: / /**\<计算机名称 > /\<服务名称 >**"。If you are connecting to a local computer, "WinNT://**\/\**". - 发现网络上的所有域。Discover all domains on the network. 例如，"WinNT:"通过枚举此项的子级找不到域。For example, "WinNT:" The domains can be found by enumerating the children of this entry. LDAPLDAP - 连接到域中的组。Connect to a group in a domain. 例如，"LDAP://CN=\<组名称 >，CN =\<用户 >，DC =\<域组件 >，DC =\<域组件 >，..."。For example, "LDAP://CN=\, CN =\, DC=\, DC=\,...". - 连接到域中的用户。Connect to a user in a domain. 例如，"LDAP://CN=\<完整的用户名称 >，CN =\<用户 >，DC =\<域组件 >，DC =\<域组件 >，..."。For example, "LDAP://CN=\, CN=\, DC=\, DC=\,...". - 连接到域中的计算机。Connect to computers in a domain. 例如，"LDAP://CN=\<计算机名称 >，CN =\<计算机 >，DC =\<域组件 >，DC =\<域组件 >，..."。For example, "LDAP://CN=\, CN=\, DC=\, DC=\,...". IISIIS - 连接到 Web 目录。Connect to a Web directory. 例如，"IIS://LocalHost/W3SVC/1/ROOT/\"。For example, "IIS://LocalHost/W3SVC/1/ROOT/\". 若要绑定到当前域使用 LDAP，使用路径"LDAP://RootDSE"，然后获取默认的命名上下文，并且重新绑定该条目。To bind to the current domain using LDAP, use the path "LDAP://RootDSE", then get the default naming context and rebind the entry. 例如:For example: ```csharp String str = ent.Properties["defaultNamingContext"][0]; DirectoryEntry domain = new DirectoryEntry("LDAP://" + str); ``` 有关详细信息，请参阅你的提供程序和主题的文档[使用 Active Directory 服务接口](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/default.asp?url=/library/adsi/adsi/using_adsi.asp)在 MSDN 库中[ http://msdn.microsoft.com/library ](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library)。For more information, see the documentation for your provider and the topic [Using Active Directory Service Interfaces](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/default.asp?url=/library/adsi/adsi/using_adsi.asp) in the MSDN Library at [http://msdn.microsoft.com/library](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library).

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Properties As PropertyCollection

summary.span: 获取此 对象的 Active Directory 域服务属性。

span.span: Gets the Active Directory Domain Services properties for this object.

value.span: 一个 对象，包含此项所设属性。

span.span: A object that contains the properties that are set on this entry.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果不初始化该属性，调用 ADSI 接口[IADs::Get](http://msdn2.microsoft.com/library/aa746347.aspx)方法来从缓存检索的值。If the property is not initialized, calls the ADSI interface [IADs::Get](http://msdn2.microsoft.com/library/aa746347.aspx) method to retrieve the value from the cache. 如果尚未加载基础缓存， [IADs::Get](http://msdn2.microsoft.com/library/aa746347.aspx)隐式调用[IADs::GetInfo](http://msdn2.microsoft.com/library/aa746349.aspx)。If the underling cache has not been loaded, [IADs::Get](http://msdn2.microsoft.com/library/aa746347.aspx) implicitly calls [IADs::GetInfo](http://msdn2.microsoft.com/library/aa746349.aspx). 此方法将加载支持尚未设置从基础目录存储缓存中的属性的值。This method loads the values of the supported properties that have not been set in the cache from the underlying directory store. 后续调用检索仅缓存中的属性值。Subsequent calls to retrieves the property values in the cache only. 若要控制加载属性缓存，请调用。To control property cache loading, call . **请注意**属性不支持对与 Active Directory 客户端扩展 (DSClient) 一起使用， [!INCLUDE[WinNt4Family](~/includes/winnt4family-md.md)]。**Note** The property is not supported for use with the Active Directory Client Extension (DSClient) for [!INCLUDE[WinNt4Family](~/includes/winnt4family-md.md)].

span.span: To retrieve the properties.

summary.span: 将此 对象的属性值加载到属性缓存中。

span.span: Loads the property values for this object into the property cache.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void RefreshCache() cil managed

summary.span: 将此 对象的属性值加载到属性缓存中。

span.span: Loads the property values for this object into the property cache.

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!CAUTION] > 到属性缓存任何未提交的更改将会丢失。Any uncommitted changes to the property cache will be lost. 使用方法以持久保存到目录存储区的更改。Use the method to persist changes to the directory store.

span.span: To refresh the property cache.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void RefreshCache(string[] propertyNames) cil managed

span.span: An array of the specified properties.

summary.span: 将指定属性的值加载到属性缓存中。

span.span: Loads the values of the specified properties into the property cache.

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!CAUTION] > 到属性缓存任何未提交的更改将会丢失。Any uncommitted changes to the property cache will be lost. 使用来保留到目录存储区的更改。Use to persist changes to the directory store.

span.span: To refresh the property cache.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void Rename(string newName) cil managed

span.span: The new name of the entry.

summary.span: 更改此 对象的名称。

span.span: Changes the name of this object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!NOTE] > 这将影响用于指代此项的路径。This will also affect the path that is used to refer to this entry. 如果是`true`，一定要调用进行永久移动对新对象的方法。If is `true`, be sure to call the method on the new object to make the move permanent.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool UsePropertyCache { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示在每次运算之后是否应提交缓存。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the cache should be committed after each operation.

value.span: 如果在每次运算之后不应提交缓存，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the cache should not be committed after each operation; otherwise, .
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 默认情况下，对属性的更改进行本地到缓存中，并要读取的属性值将被缓存后第一次读取。By default, changes to properties are made locally to a cache, and property values to be read are cached after the first read. 当属性是`true`，访问速度更快，对象的属性。When the property is `true`, access to the object's properties is faster. 此选项设置为`false`将导致每次操作后将其提交缓存。Setting this to `false` will cause the cache to be committed after each operation. 如果属性是`true`和要缓存的提交更改，调用方法。If the property is `true` and you want to commit cached changes, call the method. 若要对目录进行更改之后，请更新缓存中的值，调用方法。To update values in the cache after changes to the directory are made, call the method. > [!CAUTION] > 如果调用之前调用，到属性缓存任何未提交的更改将会丢失。If you call before calling , any uncommitted changes to the property cache will be lost. > [!NOTE] > Internet 信息服务 (IIS) 提供程序不支持每次操作后提交缓存。The Internet Information Services (IIS) provider does not support committing the cache after each operation.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ Username { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };

span.span: The user name to use when authenticating the client.
